KOffice Development Snapshot

This version of KOffice is a development snapshot between releases 1.0 and 1.1. Most day to day functions will work. However, things like filters are incomplete and will (note will, not can) cause crashes.

In addition the HTML user documentation is completely broken due to a transition in the documentation system. This is why you are reading this page now.

The main reason for including this version of KOffice at this time is to work out packaging problems and non-filter/documentation related bugs.

Ben Burton <benb@acm.org>
Tue, 10 Apr 2001 11:23:18 -0500
